page.title: 16LEISURE IN SOUTH NORMANTON
page.content: We conducted a survey of the Leisure and recreation activities of junior children and their families in South Normanton and Pinxton.The total number of children surveyed was{483.}Here are the results:Number of children taking part in various sports:Ice skating 7, Netball 69,Rollerskating 161,Tennis 90,Squash 22,Cricket 161,Football 181, Swimming 281,B.M.X-ing 123,Dancing 95, Judo 3,Horse riding 7,Gymnastics 8, These sports are played at:Alfreton L.C.253,Kirkby L.C.10,Sutton L.C.58, Ripley L.C.92,Mansfield L.C.18,South Normanton rec. ground 200,Pinxton rec. ground 64,Pinxton Miners Welfare 49, South Normanton Miners Welfare 43. 166 children go as a family to play sports.237 children play sport at least once a week was .Most people played their sport on Saturday.The children's favourite sport is Swimming
